title: Notable & Quotable: 76 Years After the A-Bomb
sub_head: ‘Hirohito made the surrender official Aug. 15. I was spared my date with death, 2½ months later.’
body: From “I Owe My Life to the A-Bomb,” an Oct. 28, 2020, Journal op-ed by William Lloyd Stearman. A longtime diplomat and White House national-security aide, Stearman died in October at 99:
